import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import UrlFrontEnd from "../models/UrlFrontEnd"; import UrlBackEnd from "../models/UrlBackEnd"; import Home from "./onglets/home/Home"; import Message from "./onglets/messages/Message"; class GoVersus extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(); this.state = { errorMessage: '', component: props.component, tab: props.tab, user: null } this.changeTab = this.changeTab.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { this.initialValues() // loading user info const token = localStorage.getItem('GoVersus_token') const url = UrlBackEnd + 'token/get/' + token + '/' axios.post(url, {}) .then(response => { const token = response.data this.setState({ user: token }) }) .catch(error => { alert(error.toString()) }); } initialValues = () => { // initial values // title change document.title = 'Home - GoVersus' // tab background color document.querySelector("#"+ this.state.tab).style.backgroundColor = '#7c0dd5' } changeTab = (component, title, url, tabId) => { this.setState({ component: component, tab: tabId }) // title change document.title = title // background change let tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.navbar-element') for(let i = 0; i < tabs.length; i++){ tabs[i].style.backgroundColor = null } document.querySelector('#'+tabId+'').style.backgroundColor = '#7c0dd5' // history.pushState({}, title, UrlFrontEnd + url) } render() { const view =
